Description: Head of Alexander the Great, right, wearing the horn of Zeus Ammon underneath an elephant skin headdress; dotted border.
Athena Promachos advancing right; in raised right hand, spear; on raised left arm, shield; in field, right, eagle; dotted border.
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: BMC Greek (Ptolemies) / Catalogue of Greek coins: the Ptolemies, kings of Egypt (45, p.5)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Alexander the Great (?)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
